message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer!  That price is a little high for me though. Would you consider $100?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.
Okay Alice, I understand.  How about $110?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $130, that's the lowest I can go.
